mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article_tag_ref at INNER JOIN article a ON at.article_id = a.article_id WHERE at.tag_id = #{tagId};

SELECT a.article_id, a.article_title, a.article_view_count, a.article_comment_count, a.article_create_time, a.article_summary, a.article_user_id, a.article_is_reprint FROM article_tag_ref at INNER JOIN article a ON at.article_id = a.article_id WHERE at.tag_id = #{tagId} LIMIT #{begin},#{pageSize}
